bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Translation of an article from The Lucha, November 5, 1900

div1.p: This article describes new cases of yellow fever and recent deaths from yellow fever.

div1.head: Translation of an article from The Lucha, November 5, 1900
div1.p:
During the twenty-four hours ending November 3rd
six new cases of fever were reported and the same number
of patients were discharged. There were four death
leaving a hundred and one cases on hand.

Those who died were Spanish with the exception of o
one a Syrian woman Mrs. Rosa George.
